## bubbles.Bubble.setAnchorLocation() method

Set the location the tail of this bubble points to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAnchorLocation(anchor: Coordinate, relayout?: boolean): void;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

anchor


</td><td>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)


</td><td>

The location the tail of this bubble points to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

relayout


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, reposition the bubble from scratch so that it is optimally visible. If false, reposition it so it maintains the same position relative to the anchor.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
